1 /**
  2  * Emily
  3  * Copyright(c) 2012 Olivier Scherrer <pode.fr@gmail.com>
  4  * MIT Licensed
  5  */
  6 
  7 define("Observable",
  8 
  9 ["Tools"],
 10 /** 
 11 * @class 
 12 * Observable is an implementation of the Observer design pattern, 
 13 * which is also known as publish/subscribe.
 14 * 
 15 * This service creates an Observable on which you can add subscribers.
 16 */
 17 function Observable(Tools) {
 18 	
 19 	/**
 20 	 * Defines the Observable
 21 	 * @private
 22 	 * @returns {_Observable}
 23 	 */
 24 	return function ObservableConstructor() {
 25 
 26 		/**
 27 		 * The list of topics
 28 		 * @private
 29 		 */
 30 		var _topics = {};
 31 		
 32 		/**
 33 		 * Add an observer
 34 		 * @param {String} topic the topic to observe
 35 		 * @param {Function} callback the callback to execute
 36 		 * @param {Object} scope the scope in which to execute the callback
 37 		 * @returns handler
 38 		 */
 39 		this.watch = function watch(topic, callback, scope) {
 40 			if (typeof callback == "function") {
 41 				var observers = _topics[topic] = _topics[topic] || [];
 42 			
 43 				observer = [callback, scope];
 44 				observers.push(observer);
 45 				return [topic,observers.indexOf(observer)];
 46 				
 47 			} else {
 48 				return false;
 49 			}
 50 		};
 51 		
 52 		/**
 53 		 * Remove an observer
 54 		 * @param {Handler} handler returned by the watch method
 55 		 * @returns {Boolean} true if there were subscribers
 56 		 */
 57 		this.unwatch = function unwatch(handler) {
 58 			var topic = handler[0], idx = handler[1];
 59 			if (_topics[topic] && _topics[topic][idx]) {
 60 				// delete value so the indexes don't move
 61 				delete _topics[topic][idx];
 62 				// If the topic is only set with falsy values, delete it;
 63 				if (!_topics[topic].some(function (value) {
 64 					return !!value;
 65 				})) {
 66 					delete _topics[topic];
 67 				}
 68 				return true;
 69 			} else {
 70 				return false;
 71 			}
 72 		};
 73 		
 74 		/**
 75 		 * Notifies observers that a topic has a new message
 76 		 * @param {String} topic the name of the topic to publish to
 77 		 * @param subject
 78 		 * @returns {Boolean} true if there was subscribers
 79 		 */
 80 		this.notify = function notify(topic) {
 81 			
 82 			var observers = _topics[topic],
 83 				l;
 84 
 85 			if (observers) {
 86 				l = observers.length;
 87 				while (l--) {
 88 					observers[l] && observers[l][0].apply(observers[l][1] || null, Tools.toArray(arguments).slice(1)); 
 89 				}
 90 				return true;
 91 			} else {
 92 				return false;
 93 			}
 94 		},
 95 		
 96 		/**
 97 		 * Check if topic has the described observer
 98 		 * @param {Handler}
 99 		 * @returns {Boolean} true if exists
100 		 */
101 		this.hasObserver = function hasObserver(handler) {
102 			return !!( handler && _topics[handler[0]] && _topics[handler[0]][handler[1]]);
103 		};
104 		
105 		/**
106 		 * Check if a topic has observers
107 		 * @param {String} topic the name of the topic
108 		 * @returns {Boolean} true if topic is listened
109 		 */
110 		this.hasTopic = function hasTopic(topic) {
111 			return !!_topics[topic];
112 		};
113 		
114 		/**
115 		 * Unwatch all or unwatch all from topic
116 		 * @param {String} topic optional unwatch all from topic
117 		 * @returns {Boolean} true if ok
118 		 */
119 		this.unwatchAll = function unwatchAll(topic) {
120 			if (_topics[topic]) {
121 				delete _topics[topic];
122 			} else {
123 				_topics = {};
124 			}
125 			return true;
126 		};
127 		
128 	};
129 	
130 });
